titles.title: Expressing the sense of Congress that Congress should raise awareness of domestic violence in the Nation by supporting the goals and ideals of National Domestic Violence Awareness Month.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.

bill.summary: 10/7/2002--Introduced. Expresses the sense of Congress that Congress should raise awareness of domestic violence in the Nation by supporting the goals and ideals of National Domestic Violence Awareness Month.
